title: Dangerholm’s mellow yellow Scott Scale project bike blurs lines between Gravel & MTB
content:
This Scott Scale Gravel mashup is what happens when weight weenie, mountain biker, and unrepentant ultra-custom project bike builder Dangerholm decides that he needs a gravel bike. Convinced that a lightweight, rigid carbon cross country bike was going to be as fast and probably more capable than a regular gravel bike, he set off to […]
